message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by its previous owners. Given its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $120. Considering its true value, I propose to sell it to you for $140. This price reflects the product's worth while also allowing us to cover our costs and ensure sustainability. I trust this offer will meet your expectations. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.
